letters.description: Gather a comprehensive understanding of the client's physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual history and current state.
Evaluate assessment data (labs, questionnaires) and explore underlying root causes and contributing factors to imbalance.
Collaboratively create a personalized integrative action plan, including lifestyle modifications, nutritional guidance, and complementary therapies, establishing clear client-coach agreements.
Support the client in integrating the action plan into their daily life, addressing challenges, and building sustainable habits.
Monitor progress, adjust the plan as needed, and empower the client to sustain their well-being and evolve their self-care practices over time.
